startConversation: Start a conversation by clicking the compose button
getStarted: Send Emails, Tweets and Telegram messaging offline using Relay SMS
vaultsOnboarding1: Login or create a new RelaySMS account to begin Communicating
vaultsOnboarding2: RelaySMS uses the standardized methods provided by the online platforms both utilizing and securing your information stored in vaults
tourComplete: Tour complete! You can add your vault accounts at anytime from within the app
savedPlatforms1: These are platforms stored in your 'Vault' and can be used when you are offline.
security1: Enable app locks and pin codes
gatewayClients1: Add/Remove Gateway clients for SMS routing
subject: Subject
securitytext1: Require lockscreen pin/fingerprint when starting the app
securitytext2: Choose which platforms you want to remove from the vault
logouttext: Logout of your account. You can always log back in, however your current messages would be deleted.
deletetext: Deleting your account means deleting all your saved accounts online. You can always recreate your account once needed.
